
```{r data preparation}
library(readr) # to read csv 
library(dplyr) # for pipe operator 
library(tsibble)
library(tibble)

# Read CSV file into a data frame
# assure path to Dataset is in '/'
data <- read_csv("C:/Users/liewg/Desktop/stat4990_project_nov_30/walmart-sales-dataset-of-45stores.csv")

# View the first few rows of the data
head(data)

# convert str date to a proper format, convert tibble to tsibble 
walmart_data <- data %>%
  mutate(Week_date = as.Date(Date, format = "%d-%m-%Y")) %>%
  rowid_to_column("ID")  %>%
  as_tsibble(index = Week_date, key = ID)

# print the head of data 
head(walmart_data) 
```
